message.content:
cs.IT, cs.NI, cs.SY, cs.LG, cs.MA. 

The paper deals with the problem of collecting fresh data from power-constrained sensors in the industrial Internet of Things (IIoT) network. It proposes a scheduling algorithm to minimize the Age of Information (AoI) metric in a multi-state time-varying network with power constraints. This problem involves aspects of information theory (cs.IT), networking (cs.NI), control systems (cs.SY), machine learning (cs.LG), and mathematical optimization (cs.MA). Therefore, these are the most likely arXiv CS sub-categories for this paper.
